one_reviews_text: As understand it,. brain scanning and modelling on computers by scientists is advancing at an expnential rate, with hoped-for cures for alzheimer's and other terrible brain disorders, as well as just a better general understanding of how the brain works, and this brain visualization is a glimpse into what that exciting work may look like. This would be better if they added a bit of audio narration to explain what you’re looking at and its significance.￼
There doesn't seem to be a way to import your own data so is very limited
